title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 6th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 6th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the Heist issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Austin Carr explains why Britain’s great model train robbery remains an unsolved crime.

-Amy Stillman details a gas heist gone wrong, an explosion and 137 deaths in Mexico

-Matt Robinson profiles how a fraudster loses to the SEC but beats the clock on penalties.

-Plus, a conversation with Jim Rowley, the CEO of Crunch Fitness

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
